Package com.pilot.jword

Interface Summary
AttributeSetExt Tag interfaces used by StyleConstantExt class
AttributeSetExt.BorderAttribute Border Attributes for Table and Paragraph
AttributeSetExt.CharacterAttribute Extra character attributes
AttributeSetExt.EquationAttribute Equation attributes
AttributeSetExt.NamedStyleAttribute NamedStyle attributes
AttributeSetExt.PageAttribute Page Attributes
AttributeSetExt.ParagraphAttribute Extra paragraph attributes
AttributeSetExt.TableAttribute Table attributes
DocumentChangeListener A listener interface for JWordTextPane document changed notifications
EditorSpellChecker.SpellCheckerListener Listener for spell checker events.
Selectable Separately selectable objects (image, ole object, shape, field etc) can implement this interface for controlling selection action
SpellChecker An common interface for spell checker implementations.
 

Class Summary
Border Keeps border properties (color and thickness) for a single border line
Borders Keeps all border attributes of an object (cell,row,paragraph,etc)
BordersAndShadingProperties Keeps data related to border and shading attributes of an object (row,cell,table,paragraph,..) for transferring to GUI or other purposes
CellProperties A data value class for transferring table cell properties
CharacterProperties A data value object for transferring character properties.
ColumnSettings A property object keeping column settings of section elements
ContentTree Represents the content part of a document or a document piece which is meant to be inserted into some location within the document.
Dimension Simple data object for object dimensions.
DragBorder This object is used for mouse controlled sizing of objects and keeps status of a drag operation on an edge resizable object (eg.
EditorSpellChecker Spell checker component of JWordTextPane.
Field The base class for Field objects which act as the internals for different type of FieldElements Field classes calculate the text to display as needed by the views
FieldDateTime A field object for displaying data/time
FieldDocInfo A field object for displaying document information
FieldMerge A field object for displaying mail merge columns
FieldPageNo A field object for displaying page number
FieldSymbol A field object for displaying symbols.
GroupEdit Represents multiple edit actions, that need to be undo/redo together.
ImageProperties This is a data value object for transferring image properties
JWordCaret Customized caret implementation used by the JWordTextPane Extra features include sizing of tables and images
JWordDocument The document implementation used by the JWordTextPane class.
JWordEditorKit This is the implementation of RTF editing functionality.
JWordEditorKit.InsertTabAction Places a tab character into the document.
JWordHighlighter Custom highlight for JWordTextPane.
JWordHighlightPainter The highlight painter used by the JWordHighlighter.
JWordTextPane A textpane extension with advanced RTF features.
JWordTransferHandler Custom Transfer handler used by JWordTextPane
JWordUndoManager Custom UndoManager for JWordTextPane
ListLevel Represents a level within a NumberedList.
ListValue This class keeps a name-label-value triplet and serves a data object for array lists and GUI elements like listboxes, comboboxes etc.
ModifyHandle A graphical handle for resizing objects, such as images, OLE objects, fields, shapes etc.
NumberedList Represents a single numbered (or bulleted) list in the document.
Numbering Keeps bullet & numbering attributes of a single paragraph.
NumberingProperties DTO for bullet and numbering properties of a paragraph
PageSettings Attributes related to page format, size etc.
PageSize Represents a single page type.
ParagraphProperties A data value class for transferring paragraph properties.
PrintHelper Print helper for JWordTextPane
PrintHelper.PrintKey  
RowProperties A data value class for transferring table row properties
RTFViewFactory A factory to create a view of some portion of document subject.
SegmentCache Keeps a cache for text segments.
StyleConstantsExt Extended attribute definitions for JWordTextPane.
StyleConstantsExt.BorderConstants  
StyleConstantsExt.CharacterConstants  
StyleConstantsExt.EquationConstants  
StyleConstantsExt.NamedStyleConstants  
StyleConstantsExt.PageConstants  
StyleConstantsExt.ParagraphConstants  
StyleConstantsExt.TableConstants  
TableColumn Properties of a table column (currently only width).
TableProperties A data value class for transferring table properties
TestUI  
Utils Utility methods
 

Exception Summary
InvalidParameterException Thrown when user input (through GUI) has invalid parameter
